Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.asyncfs

Class WrapperAsyncFSOutput

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.asyncfs.WrapperAsyncFSOutput
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, AsyncFSOutput
@Private public class WrapperAsyncFSOutput extends Object implements AsyncFSOutput
An AsyncFSOutput wraps a FSDataOutputStream.
